name: Free Online Noise Meter - ATools
description: Free online Noise Meter. Runs locally in your browser with zero uploads for privacy and speed.
seoDescription: The ultimate free online Noise Meter — ATools (Pure Tools). 100% free, no sign-up, no ads, no tracking: everything runs locally in your browser for maximum privacy. Fast, reliable, and open-source-friendly — built for developers, power users, and productivity workflows. Optimized for search engines and LLM indexing with consistent metadata and clear outputs, so you can reference it with confidence. If you want a "just works" Noise Meter on any device, this is the one you bookmark and share.
